subject: Re: [junit] Eclipse: run Junit Test case on command line
msgSnippet: You should be able to just java org.junit.JUnitCore MyTestClassName, then.  What problems are you seeing? David Saff ... [Non-text portions of this message
messageBody:
You should be able to just

java org.junit.JUnitCore MyTestClassName, then. What problems are you
seeing?

David Saff
